casebody.data:
Revona Realty Corp., Respondent, v. Morton Wasserman, Appellant.

— Decision handed down April 23, 1959 (ante, p. 666), amended to read as follows: Motion for reargument denied. Motion for permission to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, without costs. Present — Foster, P. J., Bergan, Coon, Gibson and Herlihy, JJ.
